title: I expect a yi nerf in the next patch
body:
not sure what kind of people you have on the balance team there at riot but do they even play the game? how can you play one match with a  yi on your team or the other and sit there thinking that is balanced in anyway at all 
nerf that fucking cancerous piece of shit into the ground there is laterally no counter play to being 1 shot by an attack speed champion and currently you might as well remove all tank/health items from the game because they don't work

replies.body: If you're complaining about yi in his current state then you're probably not good enough at the game to deserve complaining about him.
Its all about playing smart against him early, otherwise he gonna get fed
I've had yi in most games tonight and he's been on the losing team in most of them. He's pretty easy to counter, that's why he doesn't get much high elo play
incorrect he has over 50% winrate and is currently broken
Just get good. Yi isn't a problem  :^)
yi is a porblem you must be to bad to see it yi current state needs a nerf simple as that

I hate Master Yi as well, at least to some degree.
In the previous season I used Garen against Master Yi in top lane, it was really difficult to trade against him since he kinda dodges my attack using his Q, and he walks away, and afterwards he uses his Q again, even before I could ult him.
The best thing you can do against Master Yi is to stun him, however this is less likely to be effective now if he uses Tenacity rune.
Ekko may be able to counter him, otherwise use Nocturne, use E to scare him away, and use W to block his Q.
Volibear may be able to counter him as well, due to his lifesteal.
Tryndamere can also counter him, Kill him when you are level 6, your ult causes you to be unkillable for quite a bit of time, just remember don't trade too much in early game, use W to scare Master Yi away if you have to.

any champion with stun can kill yi easily.
and teemo can rip yi's heart from his chest and eat it before he dies.

what you need is to make sure you have a good team comp
